title: A Place to live [Greek version]
creator_credit: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, Frank Bagnall and Stuart Glover
brief_description: A film made for immigrants to Australia illustrating the kinds of housing, styles, building materials, costs, locations etc of houses in Australia. Note: In Greek.
